title: "Update tidyverse from GitHub"
output: html_notebook

```{r}

# Get from CRAN first
install.packages(c("tidyverse", "nycflights13", "Lahman", "devtools", "roxygen2", "ggtern"))

# Update from GitHub
devtools::install_github(
  "hadley/devtools", 
  build_vignettes = TRUE)
devtools::install_github(
  "klutometis/roxygen2", 
  build_vignettes = TRUE)
devtools::install_github(
  "tidyverse/tibble", 
  build_vignettes = TRUE)
devtools::install_github(
  "tidyverse/hms", 
  build_vignettes = TRUE)
devtools::install_github(
  "tidyverse/hms", 
  build_vignettes = TRUE)
# devtools::install_github(
#   "tidyverse/ggplot2", 
#   build_vignettes = TRUE)
devtools::install_github(
  "tidyverse/readr", 
  build_vignettes = TRUE)
devtools::install_github(
  "tidyverse/readxl", 
  build_vignettes = TRUE)
devtools::install_github(
  "tidyverse/tidyr", 
  build_vignettes = TRUE)
devtools::install_github(
  "tidyverse/purrr", 
  build_vignettes = TRUE)
devtools::install_github(
  "tidyverse/dplyr", 
  build_vignettes = TRUE)
devtools::install_github(
  "tidyverse/stringr", 
  build_vignettes = TRUE)
devtools::install_github(
  "tidyverse/forcats", 
  build_vignettes = TRUE)
devtools::install_github(
  "tidyverse/modelr", 
  build_vignettes = TRUE)
devtools::install_github(
  "tidyverse/broom", 
  build_vignettes = TRUE)
devtools::install_github(
  "tidyverse/tidyverse",
  build_vignettes = TRUE)
```
